website_summaries.verdict: A good vacuum marinator alternative to simple sealable containers. Perfect for individual meals.
pros: Mechanized food sealer uses individual bags to completely surround the meat more quickly than pumps and vacuums alone
Each bag can preserve foods for days or weeks longer than simple containers
Removable vacuum tray offers easy cleaning
cons: Individual bags create a lot of extra waste compared to traditional containers

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sealer is by far the best one I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum sealer is by far the best one I have ever used. My food has never been more fresh, Using the product is fast and anyone would be to use it. Anyone who cooks a lot would benefit from this product to keep their food fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: Very User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Out of the other vacuum sealers that i've had, his is honestly the best one that I have ever used! It's super easy to use so there is no hassle. I stored my salmon in the fridge and when I wanted to cook it a few days later, it tasted just as fresh! If you are somebody who likes to store food and still want it to taste fresh then I highly recommend this product. You can store many different sizes which is so convenient, it's a little challenge at first but you catch on quickly and it becomes a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just received this unit and was very happy! It is easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I just received this unit and was very happy! It is easy to set up and use. I bought this after researching other food saving equipment and thought this was best suited for my needs. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise C. Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: What an excellent product at a great price. I like the way it stands and doesn't take too much space on the counter. I'm excited to be able to vacuum pack my steaks and fish for my Sous vide. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: QjQLQQK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! Needed a vacuum sealing product that works well...did a ton of research and finally decided to give this one a try...and I do not regret my decision! Best product yet!! Works fast and really well!! Recommend this product to everyone!! So useful!
customer_reviews.author: m rap

customer_reviews.title: So Happy
customer_reviews.text: I finally ordered a vacuum sealer, it's been on my wish list for a while and decided to spend the money to buy myself one. It keeps things super fresh and can last a long time. I'm thinking that for my next trip I'm going to vacuum as much food as I can. So happy I finally made this purchase!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! This is always what I've been waiting ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! This is always what I've been waiting for! Using this to vacuum seal all my raw and cooked foods. Great for saving leftovers. Don't let the competition fool you. This is the product to get. Above all, they have the most amazing customer service.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Uhhh...no
customer_reviews.text: When my current "saver of food" bit the dust I thought I'd try something different. No bueno...suction power is weak meaning less vacuum, seal failed 80% of the time allowing for freezer burn. Saved a little money over the leading brand but in the end, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Old one was better!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the one I've had and used a lot for over 10 years. The old one worked much better! Had a stronger pump and worked on the first try! This new one takes at least 2 tries. Waist of bags! It is also kinda hard to lock down. The price was good so I hope is gets better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yayyyy it's super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Yayyyy it's super cool!! Im going traveling and I was thinking how I'm going to keep things fresh for a long period of time. This does just the job. Super duper easy to use. Happy to know I'll have fresh food when I'm traveling around the world.

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sealer is awesome. It's packaging is excellent and it comes with ...

I used this machine to vacuum seal meals for sous vide cooking which made the entire process easier. Also I am able to save food for longer. This machine is awesome and I definitely recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: has all the features you will need.

customer_reviews.text: Sooooooooooo in love with my new vacuum sealer. It works wonderfully and all the control this model offers is wonderful! It was a pleasant surprise that it came with a few bags and a small roll to make my own bag sizes. From day one i've been going crazy vacuum sealing fruits and veggies for storage and made some sous vide meals as well. I'm mega happy with it! And would definitely recommend it.

It keeps meat and fish fresh in the freezer way longer than in plastic freezer bags. I highly recommend Gourmia’s vacuum sealer to anyone!

The vacuum function stopped working after processing five or six steaks and a few pounds of chicken, leaving me with 40 pounds of chicken breast and a very expensive plastic bag maker (the only function that still works is the sealer). This machine is garbage; do not waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: This was my first vacuum sealer, and I was ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first vacuum sealer, and I was very excited to receive it and use it to seal eight bags. That's when the excitement ended. On the ninth bag, the right side seal latch would no longer catch. Upon investigation, I discovered that it would no longer catch because the release button, which is spring loaded, had lost its spring. Thus, I am returning this defective item to Amazon for a refund after less than a week of very limited use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have been debating for a while now, if I should get a vacuum sealer. I finally decided on the Gourmia, as it had all of the right features I was looking for, at the right price. It was just what I needed! I was also impressed that after I purchased the product, I received an email from the company with a user manual, enabling me to get started with saving money right away.
customer_reviews.author: Shlomo

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: Terrible performance DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: There are repeated failures on suction from day one on bags. I did not test the canning jar function. I should have returned immediately but I kept trying periodically. I missed the return date. Shame on me and shame on the company and Amazon for not extending a longer return option. DO NOT BUY THIS OR ANY OTHER PRODUCTS FROM THIS COMPANY.

customer_reviews.title: What a help!
customer_reviews.text: I buy, bake and cook alot in bulk and split it up into smaller packages to freeze. In the past, a lot of it has got freezer burned and didn't stay as long as I'd like. Now is this, I could be totally assured that each piece of meat can be preserved properly and I don't have to worry and gives a much more time. Worth its price for the flexibility that it gives me in my food preparation and busy lifestyle!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, excellent product! Definitely a must-own. The vacuum sealer is a sturdy one, not like the other narrow ones. I like the upright position because I use it on a daily basis. I use it for marinating, with the pickling feature that gets the chicken or seafood to get a stronger dominant flavor that doesn’t need too much marinating time.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Gitlitz

customer_reviews.title: it is a great vacuum sealer and I would recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after giving my other Gourmia to my daughter at a family dinner. My cabinet space is small ( I live in a travel trailer) so this fits well. I only have two complaints, 1) the compartment for "storing" bags is too small to actually put a roll of bags inside and 2) the "lock system" to prepare the bag for sealing is very difficult to "lock" for someone with carpal tunnel syndrome (that means my hands are weak). Otherwise, it is a great vacuum sealer and I would recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sealer for pickling and food storage. So far I am happy with it. It comes with an easy to use manual as well sample bags (a few ~12''X5" bags and a sample roll that can be cut with built in cutter). Drawer on top keeps the bags from cluttering my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This sealer works quite well. The secret to a good seal is after the unit creates the vacuum and seals the bag with heat, I much the seal button again so the bag gets a double treatment of heat. I bought generic rolls as they are much less expensive. They are fairly thick so the double heat makes the difference with a solid seal. Remember to push both sides to lock the bag in place before activating the sealing process.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to use, did not seal properly
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it did not seem to work properly. You have to use both hands to push down very firmly on the handles on either side. While attempting to also hold the package in place. Tried a few and two did not seal properly. Returned it and bought one, for almost the same price, on deep discount from the company synonymous with this type of device. From their website. For about half what this site is charging.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S. Bohanon

customer_reviews.title: revolutionary way to save money and preserving food
customer_reviews.text: this is the best vacuum sealer I ever purchased. this is very helpful product . great to keep food fresh. I love how its easy to use and I'm able to store in many place. also love how its a its a sleek design

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough
customer_reviews.text: It works well right out of the box. Easy to use good design. My only isssue is sometimes it fails to seal. When dealing raw meats it sucks the juices towards the vacumn and makes the sealer fail. This is not good because I feel dealing raw meat is the primary reason to purchase this.

Company also seems very involved in customer service and promptly responded to a couple of questions that I had. It also looks nice on the counter.

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if it was a stronger vacuum...
customer_reviews.text: Wish this had a bit stronger vacuum, but like the form factor and that it allows me to use the hose features I used with my old sealer (e call these our 'vacuum sucker" appliances. This seals well, and I like the roll/hose storage in the top.

customer_reviews.text: We really like this! We shop in bulk and it's perfect for saving the extra portions so we can use them for later. It's easy to use with just a little practice.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, but does not allow you to cut and seal close to the product you're sealing, wasting bag material. It's easy to miss the downward curve when you insert the bag, requiring you to re-insert and re-seal. No on/off switch, so you can't leave it plugged in.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!
customer_reviews.text: The handles on the sides of vacuum sealer will not click in place with the tray in. I believe I have a faulty unit. My husband (Ed Jennings) tried contacting Gourmia on Jan. 8. Was told he would hear back within 2 hours. Well, it's Jan 9 and no answer. Vacuum sealer is now in the box for return. Not happy!!

product_meta.title: Gourmia GVS445 Sealing System-Vertical Space Saving 8 Function Sealer, Preserve or Vacuum for Sous Vide, Silver
product_meta.description: Gourmia has brought the art of food preservation to a whole new level! Preserve, marinate & store your food for long periods of time in your pantry, refrigerator or freezer with gourmia’s Vacuum sealer & food preservation can save a ton of money when you buy in bulk, but how can you keep your purchases fresh to last a long time? this handy Vacuum sealer lets you Vacuum, seal and store foods safely for future use! just thaw it out and use it when you’re ready to eat! Choose the most ideal way to preserve your food: dry moist normal gentle pickling function - marinates food (use with canister) canister function this Vacuum sealer truly does it all and will transform the way you store food! if you don't know where to begin, we've included an Instructional manual to get started in no time. ABOUT this Product:- vertical, compact, sleek design- includes Vacuum bag roll- built-in Vacuum roll storage & cutter>- compatible with Vacuum canister, Marinator bowl, Vacuum wine stoppers>- efficient with dry or wet foods>- net weight: 2.73 kg (6lb)- 120V, ETL listed this Vacuum sealer can be used for a variety of purposes. In addition to preserving and storing foods you can use it to preserve spices and aromas into a dish or to create artisanal dry aged meats without having to go to a high scale restaurant! At Gourmia we're committed to providing you with the most customized cooking experience imaginable! that's why this Vacuum sealer features four versatile functions plus canister and pickling functions with an LED display that lets you know which function you’re using! Gourmia’s mission is to make everyday cooking easy, healthy and delicious. Our products deliver a higher standard of innovation, performance, and value and will make life in the kitchen fun and easy.
feature_bullets: STORE & PRESERVE FOOD: Our state of the art vacuum sealer is an economical solution to keep food fresh longer. Store & preserve vegetables, fruits & meats or vacuum for sous vide.
CONVENIENT FEATURES: Features a vertical space saving sleek design, easy read LED indicator lights, built in vacuum roll housing, and removable vacuum tray for easy cleaning.
8 VERSATILE FUNCTIONS: This vacuum sealer gives you a few ways to preserve your food: vacuum & seal, food, normal, gentle plus pickling and canister functions with LED display.
INCLUDES STARTER KIT: We've included a starter's kit with a roll of vacuum bags along with this easy to use vacuum sealer, so you'll be able to start pickling your foods in no time.
ETL LISTED: We, at Gourmia, take the quality of our products seriously. We are ETL certified so you can be confident that you’re receiving safe, efficient, high quality appliances.
